comments.author: Arenga pinnata
comments.body: Currently I am interested in investing in buying land, because I see land in my area, every year the price increases, and it is very profitable in the long term.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I own a house, bitcoin, ethereum, a small shitcoin allocation & cash in the bank. It is important to have a diversified portfolio but I am particularly deep in bitcoin. It has never failed me in the whole time I have been invested in it so I stick with what works. Like I said though, a diversified portfolio is important. For the average guy it might be quite uncomfortable being so dependent on bitcoin.
